text: Naludɨ 23.16 Wkp 23.15-21, 23.39-43, Nam 28.26-31 halɨha cahu uitɨ hulilalaŋ agɨlaŋ mɨdɨ lɨhuavɨci Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ hafalavɨla sɨmɨŋ hekɨlɨ hɨlanɨhalaŋ aba abɨha uami. La halɨha cahu uitɨ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ Asɨ saŋ mɨse vave sagalɨ iguhalaŋ aba abɨha uami. Avaŋ naludɨ sɨmɨŋ akuaba akuaba mɨdɨ lɨhuavɨci mɨgudɨba fɨhalɨlalaŋ agadɨ hɨvɨ avi Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ hafalavɨla sɨmɨŋ hekɨlɨ hɨlanɨhalaŋ aba abɨha uami. La nusaŋ sagalɨ iguhalaŋ aba abɨha uami.23.16 Manasɨŋ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ mɨhiŋ hekɨlɨ nagadɨ ibi mu lamavɨla abavɨhadami. Cavaŋ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨnihɨni agadɨ mɨhiŋ hekɨlɨ uavɨhadami. Lo 16.13-15 agadɨ igɨhalaŋ. Jon 7.2 agadɨ avi igɨhalaŋ.
